p:
A case report from South-Korea described the use of LPV/r in a COVID-19 patient with mild respiratory symptoms.
26 LPV/r was started at day 10 of illness. No clear inhibitory effect on viral RNA was observed in the daily sputum samples. In a randomised, controlled, open-label trial involving hospitalised adult patients with severe COVID-19, 99 patients were treated with LPV/r, while 100 patients received the standard care treatment.
27 No difference in the time to clinical improvement and in mortality was observed between both groups.
